## Background 

My group decided to compare some of our favorite books. I chose "The Picture of Dorian Gray" by Oscar Wilde. Other books from the group include, "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland", "The Bible", "The Koran" and "The Essence of Buddhism". 

## The Data

This data was obtained by web scraping and also through the gutenbergr package in R.
